    92	class RankAllocator(object):
    93	    """
    94	    The RankAllocator for AdaLoRA Model that will be called every training step. 
    95	    Paper: https://openreview.net/pdf?id=lq62uWRJjiY
    96	
    97	    Args:
    98	        model: the model that we apply AdaLoRA to.
    99	        lora_r (`int`): The initial rank for each incremental matrix.
   100	        target_rank (`int`): The target average rank of incremental matrix.
   101	        init_warmup (`int`): The steps of initial fine-tuning warmup.
   102	        final_warmup (`int`): The step of final fine-tuning.
   103	        mask_interval (`int`): The time internval between two budget allocations.
   104	        beta1 (`float`): The hyperparameter of EMA for sensitivity smoothing.
   105	        beta2 (`float`): The hyperparameter of EMA for undertainty quantification.
   106	        total_step (`int`): The total training steps, correctly configured before training.
   107	        target_total_rank (`Optinal[int]`): The speficified final total rank. 
   108	        tb_writter (`SummaryWriter`): Tensorboard SummaryWriter. 
   109	        tb_writter_loginterval (`int`): The logging interval of SummaryWriter. 
   110	    """
